title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1505.1 - General requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1505.1 - General requirements

State Regulations

Fire escapes on old multiple dwellings, on hotels and
similar dwellings, and on nonfireproof new multiple dwellings, installed
pursuant to chapter 61-B of the Consolidated Laws (Multiple Residence Law) of
the State of New York, shall conform to the regulations as set forth herein, entitled Part 1505, Fire Escape Systems. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1505.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
